name: anglicize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make or become English in sound, appearance, or character: She married Norwegian immigrant Niels Larsen, who later anglicized his name.

Add to word list
Add to word list
to change a word or name to make it sound or look like English: Lloyd is an anglicized form of the Welsh name Llwyd, meaning “gray(-haired)” or “senior."
